content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"GENERAL PRECAUTIONS TO BE OBSERVED WHEN HANDLING OR WORKING WITH SUBSTANCES\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HEALTH AND SAFETY AT WORK  ACT 2005\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Health and Safety at Work Act requires employees to conduct themselves in a manner which will ensure their own safety and that of their fellow employees.  The following general precautions should be observed when handling or working with substances.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Read the appropriate Hazard Data Sheets and any warning labels on containers \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"before use\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"line-height\":\"107%\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"#A72014\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-GB\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Make sure you are familiar with warning symbols\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The chart below illustrates some of the warning symbols that you are likely to encounter:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":266009,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/85391352-c399-471d-aa5e-17910f57f3c4/Capture3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/85391352-c399-471d-aa5e-17910f57f3c4/Capture3.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture3.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"85391352-c399-471d-aa5e-17910f57f3c4\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":437,\"height\":706},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These symbols have been designed to give you instant recognition of potentially harmful or dangerous substances.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not swallow substances or breathe in fumes or dusts. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Should this happen accidentally, obtain medical advice immediately. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not smoke near any substances,\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" especially those which are flammable or oxidising.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Take care when opening containers,\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" some materials are quite volatile and it is possible that a slight pressure may build-up in the container. Always wear suitable eye/face protection.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not ‘sniff’ substances. It is an extremely dangerous practice that can cause serious damage to your health.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Store all substances away from sources of heat, \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"particularly those which are marked flammable or oxidising.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Clean up any spillages immediately\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", using the recommended procedure.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Wash your hands both before and after using the toilet.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If any substances are splashed in the eyes, irrigate thoroughly with clean water for twenty minutes.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If you are not sure whether the product is dangerous to the eyes – do it anyway! Obtain medical advice as soon as possible.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If any substances are splashed on the skin, wash with soap and water \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"unless specific instructions to the contrary are given. Many solvent-based materials and detergents will remove the natural oils from the skin. If continuous contact is unavoidable, wear protective clothing and gloves. The use of properly constituted creams and cleansing compounds can help replace the natural oils in the skin.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not use solvent type materials in confined spaces\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" unless provision is made for forced ventilation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"13. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Should a person be overcome by fumes of any nature, move to fresh air,\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" keep warm and obtain medical aid as soon as possible.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not eat or drink in, or near to areas where substances are being used.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (Not even sweets).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"15. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Always wash your hands before eating or drinking. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Remember you may have splashes of substances on your protective clothing, which can easily transfer to your hands. Remove protective clothing before washing hands.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16. Protective clothing should be cleaned and inspected regularly.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"17. The above precautions are essentially COMMON SENSE. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not allow familiarity to breed contempt!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
